name: Drive-X-Search-Bot
description: Telegram Bot Which Search Files From Our G-Drive

AUTHORIZED_CHATS.description: Fill User ID and Chat ID of you want to authorize, Seprate them with space.

BOT_TOKEN.description: The telegram bot token that you get from @BotFather.

BOT_SOURCE_CODE.description: Add your bot source code link here! or Leave It Blank

DRIVE_NAME.description: Add Drive Folder Names, Seprate them with comma(,).

DRIVE_ID.description: Add Gdrive Folder IDs, Seprate them with space.

INDEX_URL.description: Add Index Links, Seprate them with space.

OWNER_ID.description: The Telegram user ID (not username) of the owner of the bot.

TELEGRAPH_CHANGES.description: Add any name here or your bot name for changes on telegraph page! or Leave It Blank
